pages.text: The $(mob)Fairy$() is a passive flying animal that spawns in the $(thing)Underworld$(). It flies around aimlessly and flees when attacked. It can be collected in an $(item)Empty Jar$() when right-clicked with the item in hand to produce a $(item)Fairy in a Jar$().
$(mob)Fairies$() drop $(item)Fairy Dust$() on death. This is a common ingredient for creating spells, and can be converted into $(item)Sky Dust$() when thrown into an open fire.
$(mob)Fairies$() drop $(item)Fairy Wings$() on death. They can be used as decoration when mounted in an $(item)Item Frame$().
